thread.title: Kate Ceberano tossed out of Qantas Lounge for footwear
thread.title_full: Kate Ceberano tossed out of Qantas Lounge for footwear

title: Kate Ceberano tossed out of Qantas Lounge for footwear
text:
Kate Ceberano tossed out of Qantas Lounge for footwear 5th Oct 2015 1:45 PM Local Real Estate Subscribe Now 
IT SEEMS no one is immune to Qantas' new dress code rules, with Kate Ceberano being ousted from the airport lounge for wearing flip-flops. 
The singer took to social media to vent about being kicked out. 
"Disappointed to be evicted from the Qantas Lounge after being a member since 1990 for wearing 'inappropriate footwear'? hahaha (new rules)," she wrote on her Facebook. 
In April it was revealed Qantas had banned flip-flops, shorts and vests from its business and club lounges in Australia, in a bid to enforce its new "smart casual" dress code.
